summary: EXCESSIVE OIL CONSUMPTION, OIL LIGHT ONLY FLICKERED WHEN TURNING CORNERS, OIL CHANGE ODOMETER SAID OIL WAS AT 30%. CAR  WAS MAKING A GRINDING NOISE WHEN ACCELERATING FROM A STOP. DEALER SAID THERE WAS NO OIL. THEY WERE NOT WILLING TO TAKE APART ENGINE YET. THEY RAN A CLEANER THROUGH ENGINE.
